statements: SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT id, species_name FROM BiodiversityData WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' AND crop_pollination = true;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT id, species_name, crop_pollination FROM BiodiversityData WHERE crop_pollination = false ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE habitat_type='Forest';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status='Endangered' ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT id, species_name, habitat_type FROM BiodiversityData WHERE crop_pollination=TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT conservation_status FROM BiodiversityData WHERE habitat_type='Grassland';
SELECT * FROM BiodiversityData WHERE conservation_status='Vulnerable' AND crop_pollination=FALSE ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM Biodiversity WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT species_name, habitat_type, conservation_status FROM Biodiversity WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT species_name, conservation_status FROM Biodiversity WHERE species_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CropPollination ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM Biodiversity WHERE habitat_type LIKE '%forest%' AND conservation_status = 'Vulnerable';
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity WHERE conservation_status IN ('Endangered', 'Critically Endangered') ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT habitat_type FROM Biodiversity WHERE habitat_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.crop_name, p.pollinator_name FROM CropPollination c JOIN Biodiversity b ON c.crop_id = b.species_id JOIN Biodiversity p ON c.pollinator_id = p.species_id;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity;
SELECT scientific_name, common_name FROM biodiversity;
SELECT description, scientific_name FROM biodiversity;
SELECT * FROM habitat_conservation;
SELECT habitat_type, conservation_status FROM habitat_conservation;
SELECT id, scientific_name, common_name, description FROM biodiversity WHERE id = 1;
SELECT habitat_type, conservation_status, description FROM habitat_conservation WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT crop_name, pollinator_type, pollination_method FROM crop_pollination WHERE pollinator_type = 'Bees';
SELECT scientific_name, common_name FROM biodiversity ORDER BY scientific_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, pollinator_type FROM crop_pollination WHERE pollination_method LIKE '%wind%';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM biodiversity_data WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT habitat_type FROM biodiversity_data WHERE population_size IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM crop_pollination ORDER BY pollinator_species ASC;
SELECT habitat_id, conservation_status FROM habitat_conservation WHERE conservation_status = 'Endangered';
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM biodiversity_data WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT habitat_type, COUNT(*) AS habitat_count FROM biodiversity_data GROUP BY habitat_type;
SELECT * FROM habitat_conservation JOIN biodiversity_data ON habitat_conservation.habitat_id = biodiversity_data.id;
SELECT conservation_status, AVG(sustainability_rating) AS avg_rating FROM habitat_conservation JOIN farming_practices ON habitat_conservation.id = farming_practices.id GROUP BY conservation_status;
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity
SELECT species_name, species_type FROM Biodiversity WHERE endangered = true
SELECT farmer_name, farm_location FROM Farmer ORDER BY farmer_name ASC
SELECT crop_name, pollinator_species, pollination_rate FROM CropPollination WHERE pollination_rate > 3.00
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, activity_type FROM FarmingActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Biodiversity WHERE endangered = true ORDER BY species_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT farmer_name, crops_grown FROM Farmer WHERE membership_status = true ORDER BY farmer_name DESC
SELECT crop_name, pollinator_species, pollination_rate FROM CropPollination WHERE date_last_pollinated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pollination_rate DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT habitat_name, location, conservation_status FROM HabitatConservation WHERE AREA_IN_HA > 1000 ORDER BY conservation_status ASC
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, activity_notes FROM FarmingActivities WHERE activity_type = 'harvest' AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY activity_date DESC
